name: HDWalletKit1
summary: Hierarchical Deterministic(HD) wallet for cryptocurrencies in Swift
description: Simple Swift library for creating HD ([Hierarchical Deterministic Wallets](https://bitbucket.devops.nonprod.empf.local/scm/react/bips/blob/master/bip-0032.mediawiki)) cryptocurrencies wallets and working with crypto Coins/ERC20 tokens.
